title: Are Retired NBA Players Unnecessarily Critical of Current NBA Players? | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja go deep on how retired players criticize current NBA players after Shaq’s awkward postgame interaction with Donovan Mitchell last week (6:45). Then they discuss how NBA arenas are opening up to fans in the midst of the pandemic (32:30) and share some of their favorite memories of Kobe Bryant, a year removed from his death (53:00). 
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
